mapper.sql: id, sale_order_Id, product_id, product_num, depot, sale_unit_price, sale_money
mapper.select: select a.id, a.sale_order_id, a.product_id, b.product_name, a.product_num, c.unit_name, b.product_spec, b.remarks, a.depot, a.sale_unit_price, a.sale_money from sale_order_details a INNER JOIN base_product b on a.product_id=b.product_number INNER JOIN base_unit c on b.unit_id=c.unit_id where sale_order_id = #{saleOrderId}
mapper.insert:
insert into sale_order_details
sale_order_Id,
product_id,
product_num,
depot,
sale_unit_price,
sale_money,
#{saleOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{depot,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{saleUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{saleMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update sale_order_details
sale_order_Id = #{saleOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_num = #{productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
depot = #{depot,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_unit_price = #{saleUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sale_money = #{saleMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sale_order_details set sale_order_Id = #{saleOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_num = #{productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, depot = #{depot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_unit_price = #{saleUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_money = #{saleMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
